briefTitle: Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of F-627 and GRAN®
officialTitle: A Phase III, Multi-Center, Randomized, Open-Label, Active-Controlled Trial to Compare the Efficacy and Safety of F-627 and GRAN® in the Prophylactic Treatment for Chemotherapy-Induced Neutropenia
primaryOutcomeMeasure: The efficacy of F-627 versus GRAN® in the first cycle of prophylactic treatment in subjects with breast cancer receiving chemotherapy, as assessed by the number of days in which ANC < 1.0 × 109/L in cycle 1
